welcome.title: Welcome to Measura!
welcome.description: Let's guide you through the first steps to start using the platform.

step1.title: 1. Create your Organization
step1.description: First, you need to create or join an organization. It groups your projects and team.

step2.title: 2. Add a Project
step2.description: After having an organization, create projects to organize your work. Projects are required for FPA estimates and measurement plans.

step3.title: 3. Use FPA and Measurement Plans
step3.description: With projects created, you can create Function Point Analysis estimates and Measurement Plans!
